sentence: a well-functioning, stable financial system is essential for healthy economic growth.
together with the ongoing contraction of the housing sector, the worsening of credit conditions weighed heavily on economic growth throughout 2008.
the shocks to confidence and to the availability of credit that followed the intensification of the crisis last fall have contributed to a substantial further weakening in global economic activity.
that said, the public is entitled to demand that policymakers take near-term, concrete actions to ensure that we do not face a similar crisis in the future.
